about_the_game:
【Epic Storyline】
An unprecedented crisis unfolds as extraterrestrial beings invade Earth, conquering it within days with their overwhelming scientific prowess. Humanity, shrouded in fear, secretly plans a counterattack from hidden cities. Resistance movements and armies rise, and a group of scientists, who had anticipated such a scenario, initiate the covert "Code Alpha Project". To combat this threat, a powerful, high-tech armor suit is developed. However, Earth's technology alone is insufficient. You must defeat the enemy, seize their parts and new energy sources to enhance your capabilities. Your mission: destroy the enemy's main ships (UFOs) across the globe and conquer their ultimate mothership!


【Thrilling Game Mechanics】
・As a player, eliminate various monsters to unlock different areas.
・Experience a third-person perspective for movement and a first-person view for immersive combat.
・Research and develop higher technology using the energy and parts collected from enemies.
・Protecting the people you meet in each area might reward you with special items.
・Face off against gigantic creatures and formidable area bosses, where controlling a massive robot becomes an option.
・Diverse areas await your exploration - grasslands, cities, islands, dungeons, and more. Be prepared for action-packed challenges.
detailed_description:
【Epic Storyline】
An unprecedented crisis unfolds as extraterrestrial beings invade Earth, conquering it within days with their overwhelming scientific prowess. Humanity, shrouded in fear, secretly plans a counterattack from hidden cities. Resistance movements and armies rise, and a group of scientists, who had anticipated such a scenario, initiate the covert "Code Alpha Project". To combat this threat, a powerful, high-tech armor suit is developed. However, Earth's technology alone is insufficient. You must defeat the enemy, seize their parts and new energy sources to enhance your capabilities. Your mission: destroy the enemy's main ships (UFOs) across the globe and conquer their ultimate mothership!


【Thrilling Game Mechanics】
・As a player, eliminate various monsters to unlock different areas.
・Experience a third-person perspective for movement and a first-person view for immersive combat.
・Research and develop higher technology using the energy and parts collected from enemies.
・Protecting the people you meet in each area might reward you with special items.
・Face off against gigantic creatures and formidable area bosses, where controlling a massive robot becomes an option.
・Diverse areas await your exploration - grasslands, cities, islands, dungeons, and more. Be prepared for action-packed challenges.
name: Code Alpha: The Final Frontier

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, 64bit / Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 以上
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 3GB、AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB 以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ 48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの　DirectX 9.0c以上に対応したサウンドボード
  • Additional Notes: ※Windows® 11 をご使用の場合、Windows® 11 のシステム要件に準じます。
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, 64bit / Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770、AMD Ryzen 5 2600 以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 6GB、AMD Radeon RX5600XT 6GB 以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1chサラウンド 48KHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの　DirectX 9.0c以上に対応したサウンドボード
  • Additional Notes: ※Windows® 11 をご使用の場合、Windows® 11 のシステム要件に準じます。

short_description: In "Code Alpha" battle alien invaders with advanced tech armor. Explore from cities to dungeons in mixed third-person and first-person views. Collect alien tech to upgrade gear and confront massive enemies and bosses. Your ultimate goal: defeat the alien mothership. Brace for a thrilling adventure!
